alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 12:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Las Animas County through 115 PM MDT... At 1245 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Trinchera, or 25 miles north of Des Moines, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trinchera. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
